document.discussion_title: Create News Feed Indicator by samueldominello
document.topic_text: Open Create News Feed Indicator This includes for All Pairs, CFDs, Indicies, Futures. Once I attach the indicator I should be able to see the following: For the given pair, any: High Impact News: time until it is to occur Medium Impact News: time until it is to occur Low Impact News: time until it is to occur All news on each chart should only be related to the specific pair SUBMIT DATE
document.post: Open Create News Feed Indicator This includes for All Pairs, CFDs, Indicies, Futures. Once I attach the indicator I should be able to see the following: For the given pair, any: High Impact News: time until it is to occur Medium Impact News: time until it is to occur Low Impact News: time until it is to occur All news on each chart should only be related to the specific pair SUBMIT DATE
